entities.name: marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge is described as a person who is rising off her chair towards the ceiling, entirely round and making apoplectic popping noises.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is described as a person who is yelling at Aunt Marge and trying to pull her down from the air.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is described as a person who is yelling at Aunt Marge along with Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: ripper
entities.description: Ripper is described as an animal that came skidding into the room barking madly and sank his teeth into Uncle Vernon's leg.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a person who tore from the dining room to get something from the cupboard under the stairs.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon is trying to pull down Aunt Marge who is rising off her chair towards the ceiling.
Ripper sank his teeth into Uncle Vernon's leg.
Harry got something from the cupboard under the stairs.
